name: Grokipedia Search and Article Downloader
description: Searches Grokipedia for a given query, uses LLM to select and download content from the most relevant articles, or falls back to top result links.
author: @@official.shinkai

LLM_to_rank_search_results.description: Optional LLM to use for ranking search results. Leave empty for default LLM. Use LLM IDs as shown in Shinkai (e.g., 'shinkai_free_trial', 'gpt_5', 'gemini_2_5_pro', 'o_qwen3_8b').

max_fitting_articles.description: Maximum number of best fitting articles to select (default 3, max 10)

top_results_if_none.description: Number of top results for fallback if no fitting articles (default 10, max 10)

override_max_articles.description: Optional override for the maximum number of fitting articles

fallback_links.description: List of fallback links to top related articles if no fitting results

fitting_results.description: List of the most fitting articles with their titles and markdown content

content.description: The markdown content of the article

status.description: Status indicating the outcome of the search
